thread.title: Fort Lauderdale International Boat Show Partners With QuintEvents To Elevate World's Largest Boat Show
thread.title_full: Fort Lauderdale International Boat Show Partners With QuintEvents To Elevate World's Largest Boat Show - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Fort Lauderdale International Boat Show Partners With QuintEvents To Elevate World's Largest Boat Show
text:
QuintEvents
VIP Boat Show Experiences Packages to offer boating enthusiasts private hospitality and special experiences on VIP concierge platform
FORT LAUDERDALE, Fla. , Aug. 26, 2015 /PRNewswire-USNewswire/ -- The Fort Lauderdale International Boat Show, the world's largest in-water International boat show, and QuintEvents, America's leading major-event travel, hospitality and ticket package provider, have announced a multi-year partnership to develop the first-ever luxury experience program for marine and boating enthusiasts. The new offering, branded VIP Boat Show Experiences, will launch November 5-7 , in the 'Yachting Capital of the World.'
"We wanted a proven partner that could elevate the boat show experience, meeting the expectations of the clients that QuintEvents already excels at servicing at other premier events," says Phil Purcell , Executive Director of the Marine Industries Association of South Florida .
Known for its stunning showcase reveals and exhibits in marine, aero and auto industries, the Fort Lauderdale International Boat Show joins the Super Bowl, Kentucky Derby ® , Formula 1™ and Barrett-Jackson as a pinnacle lifestyle event and show-stopper on the QuintEvents roster.
Official Ticket Packages to the Fort Lauderdale International Boat Show are your only way to access a complimentary valet service in front of the Windward Club, the new all-inclusive luxury hospitality venue at the heart of the show.
This climate-controlled oasis will make its inaugural debut at 10am on primetime Thursday, Nov. 5 , at the centrally-located Swimming Hall of Fame. The doors remain open to VIP guests until 7pm through Saturday for the convenience of private dining, gourmet food buffets, premium open bar and special showcases.
The Windward Club is also the perfect platform to network, close business or simply share the excitement of this international boating event. The club's scheduling service is the key feature to this offering, with a dedicated concierge on-hand reserving private, guided yacht tours Thursday – Saturday on behalf of VIP guests, so that they may enjoy the show's amenities at their own pace.
"Boating is a lifestyle, and we are filling a void that has been expressed at boat shows for many years," explains QuintEvents' C.E.O. Brian Learst . "We couldn't be more excited about this new partnership in an industry that is growing so quickly worldwide."
The experience offers boating enthusiasts, foreign dignitaries, and Hollywood's and sports' greatest stars access to all of the various events in and around the Greater Fort Lauderdale / Broward County Convention Center show location, with the added benefit of a relaxed atmosphere at the Windward Club.
Manufacturers and exhibitors are equally as enthusiastic for the opportunity to recapture the attention of their clientele, reaching out with this new opportunity, as well as benefiting from a fresh outlet to provide an introduction to their brand and lifestyle philosophy.
With options for Thursday, Friday and/or Saturday, guests can customize their Official Fort Lauderdale Boat Show Ticket Package to fit specific needs and budgets. VIP packages start at just $399 and are available through Official partner, QuintEvents' website www.QuintEvents.com/BoatShow , or by calling 1-844-478-7609.
The VIP Boat Show Experiences program is set to launch a new website in the fall at www.VIPBoatShowExperiences.com , where additional program benefits and access will be revealed for future shows. Manufacturers and exhibitors are encouraged to visit this site or email marketing@VIPBoatShowExperiences.com to take part in the new offerings for the upcoming years.
About the Fort Lauderdale International Boat Show
The Fort Lauderdale International Boat Show is the world's largest in-water boat show, with exhibits ranging from yacht builders and designers to exotic cars, and new and brokerage yachts. A wide variety of boats and sea vessels are on display, including runabouts, sport fishers, high performance boats, luxurious superyachts and much more. Covering seven locations and over three million square feet of space, the show's transportation network of bus shuttles, water taxis and riverboats ensures attendees can easily navigate the boat show. Over 1,400 exhibitors converge with their showcase events and displays, and the Convention Center transforms into a marine playground.
About QuintEvents
QuintEvents delivers high impact Official experience packages with unmatched access and exclusive perks to over 65 events around the world. QuintEvents is the only event company with Official relationships with 13 of the world's most prestigious event organizers including the Fort Lauderdale International Boat Show , NFL On Location, NBA, Churchill Downs, Breeders' Cup® , Circuit of The Americas™ , Formula One Paddock Club™ , MotoGP VIP Village™ , UFC® , College Football Playoff Premium , Pro Football Hall of Fame , Barrett-Jackson , and Gran Premio de Mexico .
For Program Showcase Opportunities, contact marketing@vipboatshowexperiences.com
